md:
giải nghĩa từ "negotiation" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.
Negotiation (noun) - Đàm phán, thương lượng
* Negotiation is the process of discussing and agreeing on the terms of a deal or contract.
* Example: The two companies are in negotiation to merge their businesses.
* Related words: negotiate, negotiator, negotiating

Negotiation (noun) - Đàm phán, thương lượng
* Negotiation is the act of communicating back and forth in order to reach an agreement.
* Example: The union and management are in negotiation over the new contract.
* Related words: negotiate, negotiator, negotiating

Negotiation (noun) - Đàm phán, thương lượng
* Negotiation is the art of finding a mutually acceptable solution.
* Example: The diplomat's skill in negotiation helped to resolve the conflict.
* Related words: negotiate, negotiator, negotiating

Note: The word "negotiation" can have different meanings depending on the context. The above definitions are some of the most common meanings of the word.
